content.detailedDescription: I am re-telling this event my 13yr old son witnessed this evening after returning home from a late dinner with his father.  he was clearly upset and flustered when he walked inside.  he said that when him and his dad pulled up, while getting his jacket from the truck he looked up and noticed a small neon blue structure moving from my backyard.  he said that it was level with our home and close in proximity to our house.  he said that it kinda resembled a small model airplane or oval like craft, he said that it slowly crossed in front of them, turned its light on (described it as turning bright neon blue) then turning it off as it faded from his sight.  he said it was as if was cloaking itself.  he said it gave him the feeling that it was doing a surveillance of some sort.  sucks that i was the only one home.  has anyone ever seen such a thing near their home?
content.summary: Strange small neon blue craft in my backyard near back of house........

content.detailedDescription: It was early evening between 6-7pm and my teenage daughters and i were driving north on missouri hwy 63 leaving kirksville missouri. we were about ten minutes out of town, driving north.  suddenly, a rather large low traveling blue-green fire ball suddenly came into view (what seemed like)about 5 miles north west of us.  it appeared very near the ground and looking as if it were about to impact. it was about the size of a quarter at arms length.  it appeared to streak towards the ground at an angle that one would assume would end with impact.  there wasn't much tail, if any on the beautiful object. i was certain i was about to view impact when it went out, just disappeared. however it immediately reappeared, even larger this time, still moving swiftly.  it appeared so low and only miles ahead of us i still assumed it was going to impact the ground. there was no where else for it to go except into the ground at that altitude, proximity and speed.  however, there were no visual indications of impact (explosion or noise).  if it impacted it would have been in the vicinity of north adair, schuyler or east putnam county.  we were driving north out of adair, into schuyler however it was off to the west which could have put it over east putnam county. it happened quickly and was quite beautiful to behold.  i do not recall if there was heavy cloud cover, but there must have been as the object came into view so low, as if it had traveled through the clouds and could not be seen until it left the heavy snow/rain clouds.  seems logical we only saw it as it exited through the clouds.  again, there were no indications of impact like a large explosion or any noise.  the object definitely appeared close to us, within miles. my daughter in the front seat thought it was green.  i thought it was blue.  we both agree it was large.  my daughter riding in the back seat was falling asleep and didn't see it.
content.summary: Blue-green fire ball

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside behind my house (which faces several hundred acres of woods) at 5:40 a.M. this morning; it was still dark and there was no light except starlight.  from behind me and overhead (from southwest to northeast) a green light in motion suddenly appeared (it came from the direction from over my left shoulder and into my view), flying quickly overhead and away from me in a straight direction, disappearing behind a neighboring row of townhomes.  i waited to see if there was a flash of light -- in case whatever it was hit the ground or exploded in the air -- but heard and saw nothing else.  (i never heard anything, even when it was right overhead).

the light was bright green and irregularly shaped -- somewhat oval -- but more like if you had two ovals on top of one another and then offset them so that they started to make a v shape, but not quite.  the edges of the light were crisp, and it did not appear to be anything but light (there was no visible aircraft emitting the light).   the entire event only lasted 3-4 seconds, but it was impossible to miss and i would swear in court that i am 100% certain what i saw (i have a government clearance and am trained in emergency planning, and have learned to be observant.)  

it is difficult to estimate how high the object was (and therefore the size), but it was below the clouds that were in the sky at the time (which seemed fairly low), because as it passed by the clouds above, it was still visible beneath them.  

i know it was not a plane because plane lights are yellow or white and this was bright green, plus it was not shaped like a plane, was moving faster than any plane i've seen, and did not make any noise (you can always hear when a plane is flying overhead, especially if it was as low as this light seemed to be).  it was not a meteor (i've seen many), and not a searchlight (for it to have been a searchlight, the searchlight would have had to have been positioned in the woods behind my house, and there is nothing there but 200 acres of woods; also, i would have seen the beam of light coming up from the searchlight, and there was no beam of light, just the light flying across the sky).  

i have absolutely no idea what it was i saw!
content.summary: Bright green irregular-shaped light flew into my view and out of sight in 3-4 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving into work and looked to my right over the trees, i noticed what i thought was an airplane.  the object was traveling straight down.  i thought it was an airplane that was going to crash. it was heading nose down like it was falling.  the object disappeared over the trees. i was expecting to hear a boom and feel a tremble as a result of the "airplane" crashing.  i looked to my left and saw the object on the other side of the highway ( the highway is 4 lanes, north and south)i couldn't fathom how the object was able to get from my right to my left as quickly as it did.  i then looked above me an saw another oval shaped object. i thought it might have been a helicopter but i didn't see any propellers (dawn was breaking). i noticed a halogen  light under the second object and lights all around it. the object traveled in a straight horizontal plane and immediately changed direction as if it was doing a nose dive.  i have never seen maneuvering as these object displayed.  i mean, the second object was flying straight and without a second thought or hesitation changed it's direction to completely vertical.  i tried to catch the event on my cell phone. when i played the recording back, nothing was captured. i was completely freaked out especially because i don't believe in ufo's!
content.summary: Ufo skeptic

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home on fm 410 north when i seen one bright red orange light out of my peripheral. just as i looked in its direction it was dimming out. i knew it was not an airplane as there are always planes flying over at much greater altitude than this light was at. it was stationary. 

i continued staring in the sky and then two red orange lights/orbs lite up. they were stationary, in the same place the first light came on. the two lights stay on for a few seconds and then dim out one at a time. 

i knew then this was not anything i could explain. i am still driving but now going very slow never taking my eyes off the sky. a few seconds later 6 - 8 red orange lights come on. 

the lights are in a row, still in the same place, not moving. the lights are all on for a few seconds and then one at a time they go out.

 i seen lights and noting else. i could not see what they were attached to. after all the lights went out that was it. they sky looked just like nothing was there, like the ufo was invisible. there was no sound, nothing dark blocking my view of the stars, nothing.

 i was shocked when i seen the lights because i knew what i was seeing was a ufo, but i could not believe i was really seeing it at the same time. 

as i drove closer to my home at a very slow speed, and still looking at the sky i realized that the area of the sky i seen the ufo at was almost directly over my house. 

i whipped in my driveway, stopped immediately, got out and stared at the sky, but there was nothing there just the stars. 

i went inside freaking out, i was alone pacing back and forth in my kitchen going to the window looking out, and then i would think what if they are still out there, so i would walk back to the main area. if i was to look out my kitchen window i could see the ufo if it was still there. it was not there, but i wanted to look and didn't want to look at the same time. 

i text my sister, i think i just seen a ufo. right away she called me and she was freaking out too because she said the son of the woman she worked for had just seen the exact same thing i had seen a few minutes before.

 my sister works at a gas station which is about 7 miles north of my home. the same time the boy was seeing the ufo she was closing the store when all of the sudden all the lights went out in the store, and all the lights in the entire area surrounding its location went out.
 every thing went pitch black. she said it was like something drained the power.

the home of her boss is about one mile east of the store my sister works at. this is where the boy seen the ufo. he described the exact same thing i seen. it was over his house long enough for him to go inside to get a shotgun and come back outside. it scared him. this all happened about ten minutes before i seen the ufo. 

later in the evening my sister is texting a friend about the events that had happened and he replies to her that his uncle also seen a ufo and his uncle had described what he seen to be the same thing i had seen and the boy had seen. 

his uncle lives a few miles northeast of the gas station my sister works at. 

so these lights made three appearances on the night of december 13 between 6:00 to 7:10pm in a distance of about twenty miles, with three different people, myself included, in three different locations.

i do not know the other two personally, i have not spoken more than a sentence to the other two people. we do not share anything in common except the fact that we all know my sister.
content.summary: 6-8 bright red orange orbs in a row come on then one at a time they dim out

content.detailedDescription: I couldn't upload the video so i did photo's of the ufo's. here, i started out to take my doggie, dj, out to pee and was thinking about the other times i have caught ufo's hanging around and getting some great photo's and i am a photographer for year's...I looked and watched as a gynormous huge mother ship !!! no crap! i watched it and tried to get my camera out,that stay's on my side, and just missed the huge ufo. it had no light's on it and i could see window's on it and what looked like a computer board from a computer but in black. no light's and it suddenly manuvered a 15* turn and fast and shot off so fast that we, (american's) never could have that kind of technology.I am an industrial wiring technition, and i put computer's together. i have a vast experiance in this area. and don't drink or do drug's. i am a devout christian and study the way's if god every day.I watched it speed off and the government can't verify it as being one of their's they don't have this kind of technology and won't have it for atleast 2 or 300 year's from now. even if they can reconstruct a ufo from scratch. thay don't know the codes for navagation of the ufo. a translater could if they knew the language..He,he,he... so it sit's in a hanger and never will be seen or acknoledged....I know this because i was in a ufo..I don't remember all of it, but i do remember the feeling i got when they are here. an enlightened feeling of mind. a good feeling. not harmful at all. and i have definitave proof that ufo's exist and tht alien being's exist and i can prove both  too in one video !! have a video that has been stashed-- and if anything happens to me it will be telivised all over the nation on a secure channel. i have had several close encounter's with me and my dog. and proof is all i have a no-one will investigate this.. and it is still happening today. if you are in the area of northgate mall on the roof you can get some fascinating photo's.I have one in  the area that was within 30 ft. of my front door. and i have proof of that too ! as i mentioned before.They are doing a study on me as well as i am on them..They don't want other people to know; as not to pannic the nation. i also have "radar photo's" of the alein ship's location's showing a grid on my digital photograph and showing other same ufo's. i have seen this and it look's like a radar grid layout showing the possition's of all other ufo's that are over earth and only in my area. my digital camera doesn't have grid patern's in it's programming? so all the ship's are the same on some area's and other's show diferent ufo's. to this day i have categorized quite a few ufo's.More than any other person on earth. atleast in this area i am king of photography of ufo's here..Feel's good letting other's know what i have kept secret all these year's. *(wit's last name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Ufo desended from the cloud's out of the southern sky and broke the clouds and hovered over the tree's and turned 15* and shot off faster then anything we human's h

content.detailedDescription: I was hanging out with three friends, and a mutual friend of theirs.  two of the friends were a couple, and they left to get dinner, so the rest of us returned to my friend's condo, which is near marina mile and i-95.  we were standing on the balcony smoking cigarettes, when my attention was drawn to a flash of light out of the corner of my eye.  i looked to the east-northeast and, between some tall slash pines, i saw a strange object.  it was at least a few miles away but, without any reference for its size or distance in relation to other points, i cannot be much more certain of its position.  it was a glowing white "sphere" (or something like a sphere).  it dove straight down, and as it moved a trail of sparkling white light trailed behind it, almost like the trail of certain meteorites.  then it "zigged" (for lack of a better term to describe its motions) quickly to my right (probably moving east-southeasterly) and slightly down at an angle a short distance.  at first i thought it might be a firework.  then it stopped, and the sparkling trail stopped at the same time.  i was confident at that moment that it was not a firework, and i pointed it out to my friend and his friend.  as we looked, the object zigged back to my left (probably moving north-northwesterly) and down at a slight angle about the same distance from where it started that it had moved to the right, the sparkling trail of white lights one again following behind.  my friend's friend suggested that it was a plane, or a helicopter, but me and my friend were quite certain it was not, and were asking each other and ourselves aloud what the object was.  during this time it zig zagged twice more, first right then left, about the same distance as its the sparkling trail following when it moved and disappearing when it stopped, and then simply faded away.  immediately after it disappeared, a second object appeared right where i had noticed the first object.  like the first object it was a white glowing sphere.  like the first object it first dove straight down, the trail of sparkling light following.  then, like the first object, it zig zagged right and left, following roughly the same pattern as the first in terms of direction, angle, distance, and velocity and also stopping at the same places and for the same amount of time.  after it zig zagged about four times, it proceeded to start diving up and down, at slight angles, the trail still following it when it moved and disappearing when it stopped.  at one point it dove up and stopped and then faded to a dim point of light, almost unnoticeable, in fact i thought for an instant that the object had disappeared, but then it flashed back to its previous intensity and started diving slowly down.  finally it dawned on me to ask if anyone had a cameraphone, which my friend did, and was able to catch the last 22 seconds of the sighting, by which time the object was very low, at times partially hidden by the tree, and its movement up and down and side to side became much more slight than it had been previously.  my friend's friend was behind us, having gone back into the condo, and was making jokes, obviously thinking we were fools and that the objects were (as he had maintained) a plane or a helicopter.  we thought no less foolish of him given that the objects clearly did not behave like or appear like any airplane or helicopter that exists.  at some point the object disappeared, possibly behind the trees, or behind the interstate, or both, or maybe it just disappeared like the first, we could not be certain.  afterwards me and my friend spent a great deal of time asking each other what the heck we had just seen.  it was not the first time i had seen a ufo, as it was in his case, but it was the first time i had seen more than one at a time.  we told our two friends, the couple, about it when they got back, and tried to show them the video but, unfortunately, on a cameraphone screen it was not very impressive, plus we had been very late and missed most of the action, but on a larger screen it is somewhat more convincing.  we wished we had not been so hypnotized by the incident that we were slow in recording it.
content.summary: Two sphere shaped ufos with flashing trails zig zagging across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
See above: the purple light focused on my dear i & our cat, as i walking approached, i was told of this light. 
the twinkling within that light, as i stepped into it, had a certain familiar or sensitive tune to it...
standing there the cat(our pet of some then 6 years-lived in outside perchhouse) jumped free of arms in that light to his other perch, my dear & i within that light. when i finally looked up, i saw the saucer, and side window a human looking bearded man! i observed his stance, then saw he was bearded very biblical looking.

later we attended physician (of some 7 years) :not telling of close encounter of 4/5 kind(yes?) nor even of sighting of ufo. kept stricktly secret until i let it out summer 2003.We had a family court matter ended badly needed no further troubles.

more persecutions also from telling. reality for some, unfortunately, is lives of persecutions from neighbours, ;family-members, sometimes are the worst!
we have had our share suffice to say. the malefactors lawyer died, suddenly when my stenographer called then called back said he had just died upon information recd. only just. then we also learned that the obnoxious and offensive justice, in error (respectfully) his judgement was made in terrible error. nonetheless upon efforts to remedy he died. nearly the same day or perhaps week as the lawyer. we are uninformed as to the exact dates, as yet. nonetheless, i fear these sightings are of a biblical nature. our sighting was almost godsend. by god's law we were reunited, saved from further direct persecutions after our reunion, for the most poart.

please consider whether my experiance might be carefully made public.

i am tired of being persecuted, even for these...

seal esq to jc
content.summary: Beryl underneath light focused on we two:lone humanoid  beard saucer bay window musical-light, sudden dissapeared;scaly patches necks. family courtloss relieved judge&lawyer died suddenly:odds? dreams visions presence jesuschrist godlike.

content.detailedDescription:
*(link moved to additional evidence section -- cms/sg).

this is the exact same thing we have on the lisa goff video which you guys were sent years ago. the location is about 80 miles from where this was taken
content.summary: Not ufo but alien like creature as reported on news

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting at the bus stop, with other kids, to go to school, i remember seeing the bus coming around the corner.  then i just looked up, for no reason, and i see a flying object that i couldnt identfy.  it had a sphere on the top of it, and a upside down cone conected to the bottom it, the bottom of the cone wobbled in a spinning motion. the whole 10 seconds i watched it, the wobble was slow, and then rapidly wobbled fast, as it zipped up in to the sky, out of sight. i looked to see if anyone else saw that, and mostly everyone was on the bus already, and nobody said anything about it. now that i think about it, i wonder if it left because we left on to the bus, or if it wasnt paying attention, when i saw it, and then saw me looking at it.  that was the first and only time i have seen a flying object, that i couldnt identfy.  i wish i could see it again.
content.summary: Dont know why i looked up, and i was the only one who saw it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking on mayview drive (2100 block) in los feliz on december 13, 2010 and took two pictures (using my cell phone camera) of the sun setting to the west over los angeles.  i am guessing it was approximately 4:30 to 5pm.

i did not notice the object in the sky until after uploading the cell phone pictures to my laptop. the two photos i've submitted were taken approximately 5 to 10 seconds apart.
content.summary: Taking pics of sun setting in l.A. (approx. 4:30 - 5pm) and noticed object after uploading to laptop

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were out at placerita canyon. off in the distance were the mountains, canyons, and a small road. the sound began at the ridge of the mountain and continued going down toward the canyon. then took a slight left and began to move toward us. the sound moved right on top of us, then in an instance it seemed as if the sound fully engulfed us. i looked up into the sky to see if maybe there was something but to my avail nothing. it was as if i wanted to see an object just to explain this sound. it lasted for a good 10 to 15 minutes then moved away from us to the main road. the sound stayed there at the road for a few minutes then suddenly stopped. no car head lights where around. the sound just stopped just as soon as it began.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: No ufo just a continuous sound

content.detailedDescription: It was a cool summer night. my mother was sitting on the porch with me. it was the end of a long day, and as usual we decided to stargaze. we very often would stargaze and nothing out of the ordinary would ever happen. i have lived in the same house my entire life, stargazed on the same porch my entire life. before this event i only had one other supposed ufo encounter, and i was only a kid and i don't remember all too much about it. i didn't think much about it after. this event was more recent. it happened august of last summer. my house is located in a quiet neighborhood, connected to what can barely be considered a city. seems like more of a town to me. anyways, we were sitting on the porch, looking at the stars, pointing out constellations, planets, and what we believed to be a satellite. my stare was focused on this object until my mother pointed out another, more interesting object in the sky to me. an incredibly small, orange glowing dot was floating across the sky. we assumed it was a star, until it began to move. it first floated in our direction. it was not blinking, it was just a solid bright orange. it suddenly stopped. without curving it's path, it floated to the right. then, it floated to the left, again without turning or curving it's path. like if a car wanted to do a u turn, but instead just drove in reverse, or just switched the driver seat around. while going left, a plane crossed it's path. the plane was heading towards us. it seemed to come out of nowhere. it met the orange glowing dot at what seemed like exactly 90 degrees. a few seconds after the plane and the dot crossed paths, the dot quickly faded away. the plane continued it's straight path for a short while, then began to slowly turn left. a minute later, two planes flying paralell to each other passed over the area where the dot dissapeared. throughout all of this, we were in awe. all we could say was "do you see that?What is that? wow!" we weren't scared, but we were confused and amazed. after it was over and done with, we laughed and discussed what we saw. and like any teenager, i reported the event on my facebook page.
content.summary: It looked like an orange flying star. it did not blink. it moved across the sky and switched direction without turning.

content.detailedDescription:
2 hemispheres seperated by a center ring

i was driving in front of the power plant and went around a curve. thier it was huge, about the size of the super dome. the cloud cover was at 23,00 ft that day  and this was below the clouds.There where also strong winds that day, and i believe that there was a small aircraft adviery, due to the winds. it stayed in place,  on a wobble. whent into another curve while driving  and looked back to see it again  and it was gone.
this object was shinny silver, like a mirror. it was also near a power plant, accros the road. it also had a wobble to it. 
all i can think is it was tapping free electrons from the power plant.
content.summary: Looked like a metal hamburger

content.detailedDescription: Everything at about 4to4;30 am i go for my walk. i always go up on our golf course because it dark and i can watch the sky. i have watched the sky since i wa in grade school. i am 73 years old. the three circles one inside the other were at the cup end of the big dipper and appeared to be behind  the dipper. the odd thing was that thhey would appear and then disapear but didint blink or flash i should say the circles were made of disks forming the circles. after about five minutes i turned and walked away how long they were still there i donet know. the next morining at app. the same time they were at the same spot apperaing and diappearing as they did the morning before. the thrid morning wbich would be wednessday there was nothing there. i should say that there was a full moon the entire week.  sincerely *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Three circles one inside the other with the outside being the largest

content.detailedDescription: I was awaken from my sleep late in the night,my body body was shaking uncontrollably,felt as though i was having a seizure,i could do nothing but cut my eyes around the room and i noticed a small white figure pointing something at me.I started yelling but my mouth wouldnt open,after a short time a was able to gradually open my mouth and yell louder,then everything went back to normal. this event happened twice in the same week but not as dramatic as the first time. the being was about 3 ft tall,slim build and big dark eyes with what appeared to be maybe a white suit
content.summary: Small entity standing at my bedroom door staring at me

content.detailedDescription: On fourth of july 2010 me and my family were outside in our yard lighting off fireworks , i had lit a roman candle and proceeded to walk towards my neighbors yard . the candle started shooting in the air and my father was standing next to me . about half way through the candle a red orb like craft with three yellow lights under it flew over our neighbors house . the craft did not make a sound and was flying pretty low . my dad then screamed out whoaaaaa !!! did you see that? i said hell yea i saw that it wasnt a plane not that low and that quiet . the sighting gave me a chill and i know it was something not from this earth. after the incident i told everyone what we had saw and they basically thought we were nuts. but i know what we saw and my father was the only witness.
content.summary: While lighting fireworks the craft flew over my neighbors house

content.detailedDescription: I was at home watching my sister and stepped outside to let the dogs out. when i walked on my front porch, i saw three lights that were not consistent with aircraft, almost like an orange-blue color, above a barren tree in my neighbors yard north west of my front door, but the lights stayed still and did not move. it was a clear winter night. it was at a fairly low altitude and i watched the lights for roughly 30 minutes before they vanished before my eyes. i was absolutely dumbfounded by what i saw. i had never seen anything like it before in my life, and told my father about it later that night. i have always wondered about the incident, but thought nothing of it until this morning when i saw chris bledsoe saw the same thing around the same time. what astonished me even more is that fayetteville is an hour away from rockingham. there are many aircraft i have seen fly over the house before, but nothing like what i saw that night.
content.summary: I went outside to let dogs out and saw lights hovering above a tree behind my neighbors house.

content.detailedDescription: While watching news 4 buffalo om the erie canal traffic cam i saw a bright white light zoom accross the sky
content.summary: Bright light shooting

content.detailedDescription:
Here's a copy band paste from my e-mail:
"while reading my paper files here in gilmanton where i live i looked out the window and saw this black ball in the sky, that i first thought was a balloon floating up there in the nw sky, but then upon going outside for a better look above the trees it was moving too fast, in a beeline from nw to ne and a little bit south, so you might want to contact the police departments of the towns and cities to the east of here and a bit south to be on the lookout for whatever this is if it continues in this same direction and might be seen with a camera?

mailing address: *(wit's name and address deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Black ball in n.H. sky

content.detailedDescription: I had just taken my dog out for a walk, and decided to stay out a few more minutes to look at the meteor shower. i had counted 9 meteors as i stood there smoking a cigarette and looking skyward. just as i finished my cigarette i took one last look skyward, and was about to head inside. suddenly i noticed a silent shape moving directly through my field of vision traveling from nnw to sse. the shape was in a v  of solid mass at, what i assume was, a high altitude. at first i tried to dismiss the sighting as ducks or geese but then realized that it was moving too fast. the object was unlighted and entered and left my field of vision within seconds. moving at a speed that was faster than a commercial airliner could leave my field of vision seemed unlikely for birds. as soon as the object was out of sight, i came inside, told my wife what i had just seen, then grabbed my iphone and began this report. i know geese generally fly and make noise as well so the fact there was nothing but silence and the speed combined slowly made me realize this had to be something else. what it was, i don't know!
content.summary: Sighted v shape during geminid observation

content.detailedDescription:
The sun(solar flare) moon and stars(angels)

pictures in video were taken in mimbres, new mexico in the year 2001. the sight was awesome and the pics do not do justice to the event. the cloud of fire was huge and powerful yet beautiful and calm. there were many stars flickering as if agitated inside the "sun" and many other things going on inside. it was transparent as if though you were looking through a portal to all the galaxies and universes. there were also two other witnesses. one of the pics was on the front page in a small corner of the sun news in silver city that i believe read "solar flare in mimbres."  mimbres is approximately 25 miles east of silver city. i was a freelance photographer for them and the pic in the newspaper was from them developing the negatives and scanning them as they had new equipment to be able to do that. i still have the negatives and many are aware of this.

*several youtube links moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg.  


if you look at the videos they will tell you where i was and what i was doing. the event happened in a small town called mimbres, next door to the mimbres restaurant at a two story house. i have the negatives in a safe place. i was not afraid but the other two were excited and seemed fearful. i was upset because i was awakened from a beautiful dream, as sometimes i do have and was upset because i was wakened. i was dreaming i was in the solar flare and looking down and beside were two peopl, i belive, but could not see their faces as they were white like lightning. as we were coming over the horizon i noticed that landscape and it was dark and remembered that i had to go down but there was no ladder an all of a suuden all i saw were tree branches and the roof of the two story house i was sleeping at when all of a sudden i hear the door flung open and somebody saying "grab your camera and look outside." in the dream it felt as though the people that were beside me were my equals and did not feel like an abduction. it was most awesome and i did not want to come back down. when i raced down and saw the solar flare the other witness who was still watching, i believe, said that one of the stars shot down over the house or shot a beam but i believe he said one of the stars shot down over the house.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.shape: Circle,   Diamond,   Disc,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Solare flare, stars and moon

content.detailedDescription: I heard only the helicopter. i looked up to see it. it was very loud and i thought it might be military since we live near pendleton. it was traveling at a very high rate of speed. when i looked more closely, i saw that there was a solid white ball of light a distance in front of the helicopter. i could not tell how high the white light was. it seemed high. the helicopter seemed lower in contrast.  the helicopter and the white light were traveling a similar speed. a consistent distance was maintained between the two throughout the sighting. i could not hear any sound other than the helicopter. the helicopter had a red (navigation?) light on it. the solid white light was all that was visible of the object that was in front of the helicopter. the white ball of light traveling in front of the helicopter was smaller and dimmer than the red light on the helicopter. the white light traveled in pretty much a straight line as a meteor would, but the light itself was completely consistent in intensity throughout its trip across the sky. also the light was a round shape in contrast to a meteor which has a tear drop shape. the light was dimmer than a meteor normally is. i watched it travel across the sky until it crossed the horizon out of view. it took the light and the helicopter less than 2 minutes and probably closer to 1 minute to travel 90-120 degrees across the sky. the sky was totally clear with stars very visible. the craft and the helicopter traveled north to south. i was facing east when i watched them. it was approximatively over the 15 freeway as it passes through the east edge of fallbrook / bonsall.
content.summary: Helicopter traveling a high speed chasing solid white ball of light

content.detailedDescription:
December 13, 2010

  for past 2 days in mesa, az which today will make it the third day, i been observing this faint white and round object that seemed to just appear in the sky around 1315 hours.  the object could easily be overlooked especially with sunglasses on or if you were directly in the sun.  once your eyes has adjusted, the object can be seen and sometimes with no difficulties.  the object from my prospective seemed to just be hovering although it is moving extremely slow.  what seems always, the object would appear while looking almost southwest in direction (compass bearing 244 degrees) from power rd. and hwy 60,  and between 30 to 45 degrees above the sw horizon at an altitude estimated to be about 3,000 feet (or near high air traffic route height).  the object appears to be traversing west (270 degrees) from the east direction (90 degrees).

  and  for the past two days, i been also trying to get additional  picture of it using the tripod and remote.  today, i managed to set my camera on the tripod, locate,  and keep track of the object.  i used 2 different lens:  a 300mm lens 4.5g and a 500mm lens with a 2x telo-converter (1000mm) with built-in darken lens.  have lots of picture of it with the 300mm unfiltered. 

 when i used the 1000mm, the object was about 22 to 30 degrees above the horizon. the camera was set to manual mode and focus set to manual mode.  i set the film speed to iso400 (because of the object dimness), pixels to raw,  f-stops "0",  and i bracket the shots between 1/30sec to 1/800sec in the beginning.  in that way, i was guarantee at least one picture being good.  in the beginning, i focused the lens by focusing on a jet near the same distant in order to locate the object.  working with a set-scope can prove challenging when trying to locate a small and sometimes dim object in the far distant with a darken lens.    3/4 of those pictures taken are salvageable; the others are white washed beyond fixing, and the darken pictures seems to show more object details and color rather than just white.

  tomorrow i'll be watching for it again starting at 1300 to see if it passed over me, or it just appear where i been seeing it appearing.  absolutely not a jet, helicopter, or bird.  possible balloon, however that's unlikely since the object was spotted at a distant of 3 to 8 miles at extreme altitude.   it don't look to be a weather balloon neither since weather balloon i seen and captured on film usually has something hanging below the balloon (like it was two separate objects).  the object been seen south of gilbert, southwest  of mesa.
no guarantees that it will repeat its pattern tomorrow, but i'll be waiting for it with my camera in hand.


so far, it is still an ufo to me.

the picture shown is the 1000mm.
content.summary: Round and small object sometimes dimly lit seen traversing same time and path 3 days straight, and it's not obvious until you see it but still unknown and not the usual suspect presumed to be.

content.detailedDescription: I had just sat in my friends hot tub outside on a dark clear and starry night - i love looking at the sky up there in the mountains because of the almost non existent light pollution - i noticed three moving lights approching from the west, from over the mountains - it moved rather slowly and steadly from the west to the east passing over my location at approximately 1/2 miles to the north of my location - it was the apparent size of a quater dollar held at arms length - it was completly silent even though i expected to hear something since it was very quiet in my immediate vicinity - i looked away from the object to see if i could notice anything else about it like when you look off to the side of a dim star - i did this several times and did notice that there was a soft dim glow in what would be the center of the triangle - i have heard of sightings of a triangle shaped object before but never really believed the reports - my thought after the sighting was simply "now what do i do" since i never did believe in this sort of experience - the object continued to the east where it became no longer observable when it reached the easteren horizon.
content.summary: A triangle shaped object, three lights one at each apex of the triangle, silent

content.detailedDescription:
After dark - my wife and i were driving east on highway 70 between boswell and soper oklahoma.  we noticed ahead in the eastern sky, two very bright lights close together, about 30-deg above horizon.  the lights alternated blinking out and reappearing several times - then the visible one initiated what appeared to be three successive and distinct "shooting" forward of new objects with bright tails - but with the each new object originating from the previous.  the object(s) then simply disappeared.

approximately 5 minutes later, four dimmer objects were noticed in the ne and northern sky.  we pulled over to the side and got out of the car and observed the objects moving east-to-west, and west-to-east by making erratic changes in direction and speed.  one of the objects appeared to be coming toward us (became much brighter) and then again it began the "shooting" process with each new streak ending in a new light and then shooting out again. this event included four distinct "shootings" - and then the light disappeared.

the initial feeling was we were observing a fireworks and/or flares display.  this feeling changed to thinking we were watching a modern day dogfight.  this excitement was fortified by the sound of jets overhead - but the sounds did not seem to correspond to the location of the lights.  i seemed as if the jets were attempting to intercept the objects.  

at this point i called 911 on my cell and reported the sightings to the hugo, oklahoma 911 operator.  i explained that there was a light show going on in the northern sky and that she would probably be getting some additional calls.

overall, we observed the lights and listened to the jets for 15-20 minutes.  the lights eventually disappeared (dimmed out) but in different quadrants of the northern sky.
content.summary: Multiple light displays -

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work, heading east on link road, in fountain.  the sunset was bright and dramatically orange and pink, behind me.  i was driving 30 mph and as i approached a railroad crossing and happened to look up at something shimmering in the eastern sky.  it looked low and i assume the radiant sunset made it sparkle, but it also looked as though it may have been slightly illuminated.  at first i thought it was a balloon someone had let go of since things in the sky while you are driving can be deceiving.  i watched it for about three seconds and realized it was not a balloon because it was moving too fast.  it was precise and it 'zoomed' down over the eastern horizon until it was out of sight.  i just kept watching and driving.
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Circle,   Diamond,   Fireball,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Sparkling fast-moving object descended toward eastern horizon

content.detailedDescription:
The wife and i had driven to san angelo from brownwood that day to find some good food we'd read about on the internet.  we were just a mile west of santa ana on our way home and it was just now becoming completely dark.  i observed the object just 15 degrees to the right of the road from my point of view in the passenger seat.  at first i thought it was a  really low plane but there's no airport for quite a while, and it was a quiet night with no sounds at all but the car running.  i watched the object which seemed to be just a hundred feet up hovering and turning clockwise.  i could tell it was turning because it had three very bright white lights, and i could see the round shape, but there were no blinking lights and the lights weren't pointed down like any plane light i'd ever seen.  it was a perfectly clear night too.  at first i thought it was a plane turning, but the lights kept coming around the object, two lights showed and then three as one would rotate out of view and another would appear from the other side.  it made about ten revolutions and disappeared completely.. no more lights, no more dark spot. i might have blinked!   5 seconds later my wife said, "did you just see that?"  and i said, "yes, i did, but kept silent from the awe."  she said the same.   we slowed and looked around.  the only other traffic was an 18-wheeler behind us and he slowed too and seemed to be looking for the object also!  we pulled over to let him pass but he just waved and pointed up, so we knew he had seen it too!  i didn't even try for the camera since it was so dark it would have never made a decent photo or video.  it took me almost a week to report because i thought "nobody would believe this" and i probably listened to way too much art bell in the 90s, but  i checked the time before and after and wrote down where we were as soon as we started moving again.  

i whipped up a drawing in paint...And my wife said it was pretty exact, so here it is!
content.summary: Dark object with 3 white lights

content.detailedDescription: (10:55 pm) on december 11, 2010 in northwestern broward county (south florida). my boyfriend and i were doing laundry at the local laundry mat. we parked in the back of the building which is on a main road that runs west and east from the everglades to the atlantic ocean. this location is about 10 blocks from the everglades which is right on the otherside of the sawgrass expressway (literally). my boyfriend went inside to check on the clothes in the dryers and i stayed in the passenger seat of our car. i was watching videos on my phone when i got a weird urge to look out at the sky so looked out the passenger window. i was shocked to see what appeared to be the big dipper constellation because stars are hard to see in our city due to all the light pollution. what caught my attention was that more of these "stars" began to appear. i then realized i was looking at a cluster of orange orbs moving rapidly from west to east and immediately got out of the car. i yelled for my boyfriend to come outside now! and i'll be darned if as soon as i did they begand to disapear. by the time my boyfriend was able to get outside only 3-5 were left. they made no sound. this entire event took place in the span of about 20 seconds. i am very dissapointed that i did not have a chance to grab any videos or pictures. i have lived in broward county my whole life and never saw anything like this before.  as a resident here i am very familiar with how airplanes appear at a low altitude since i work right next to an executive airport and fort lauderdale international is right off of i95. anyone who has driven on i95 enough times could tell you about seeing the que planes form before landing and experiencing having a boeing fly 50 ft above your car as they drop the gears for a touchdown. these were not planes. i was a logical optimist; a "the universe is too vast for us to flat out say we are alone" type of person. i am undoubtedly a believer now.
content.summary: Multiple orange orbs flying west to east over west fort lauderdale

content.detailedDescription:
There are now multiple angles of footage on both december 1st and december 8th of strange falling fireballs over santa monica.
 
 
we have
footage by multiple witnesses
footage from multiple vantage points
footage from two different dates
footage with electronic time, date and location metadata
 
 
event one - december 1st, 2010 5:09pm

my personal account of the dec 1st 2010 incident and my silver surfer ufo video
this happened on december 1st, 2010 at 5:09pm on a walk in santa monica california. my wife and i were walking west about 17 blocks from the ocean when we saw these bizarre objects in the sky. it happened so fast, i barely was able to film... and i went off the objects to get a better vantage point, so only caught them for a brief moment at the beginning of the film. i really messed up the recording because i didn't know how fast it would all happen. fortunately i caught a brief moment of the objects using my iphone. i have no idea what they were... but as you can see... they were big and high in the air (seemingly over the ocean) and shooting off some kind of myst, contrail or light. the top one changed directions twice that you can see on the film if you forward through the beginning frame by frame. both objects were dropping really fast. when i was walking across the street to get a better vantage point, the iphone was unable to refocus the light, and you can't really see much after i cross the street... but you can hear in my voice that the objects were weaving back and forth like the "silver surfer". these things just dropped super fast. they had these crazy short contrails... and weaved back and forth as they dropped. there were not any planes visible that the objects could have been dropped out of... and what the hell were the contrails coming off of them?!?! it really looked like the "silver surfer" from a cartoon. crazy... and i have no idea what they were... but just wanted to share. i wish i had a better vantage point when i was filming. it does not look nearly as impressive on-screen, but i tell you that seeing it was totally wild and bizarre. at least you can see how about how big the objects were, what they looked like with the contrails, and that they were changing directions and dropping rapidly. i am just glad i caught even a moment of it on film. anybody else see anything like this before? anyone else see this that night in santa monica? maybe someone knows what they were.
content.summary: Silver surfer ufo - fireballs over santa monica on dec 1st and 8th 2010
